body: Hello, I noticed a strange behavior of the Sun Path component. I need an analysis period from 22 April to 22 August. But I see that may has 28 days (instead 31) and July 30 (instead 31). Do I miss some proper input or the component has a problem? Francesco [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ZHwlIMnY51L1qAyyuwVhaxdIoF-oVvJ02GW0kXjDoXHuuaRCfNE9cxSPC0GyVRk-ifEafcY7zdk0bBbeo4tjM4GpqKhazFOu/strangemonths.JPG)

replies.body: Yes I think that the component considers the first month always as January, the second as February and so on and so forth.

This appears to be a big issue, indeed.  If Mostapha has not been able to look into it within a day, I will try my best to fix it.  The sunpath is in some great need to code-cleaning, though, and Mostapha would be able to fix it much more quickly than I.

-Chris

Yes! Francesco's instinct was right. It was a bug for partial analysis period. Just fixed it ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/fc871a69f0893ef0...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/fc871a69f0893ef0bc90f761873e27532d937fef)).
